---
title: "Moroccan chickpeas"
author: "[Fiona Beckett](https://www.goodreads.com/book/show/6791894-the-ultimate-student-cookbook)"
categories: [moroccan, vegan]
description: "A staple from when I was a University student"
---

- 1 onion
- 2 garlic cloves
- 2-3 tsp Moroccan spice mix
  - 1 tsp cumin
  - 1 tsp coriander
  - ½ tsp turmeric
  - ½ tsp chill powder
- 1/2 tin chopped tomatoes
- 1 tin chickpeas cooked
- handful fresh spinach

1. Fry onion for 5min. 
1. Add garlic and spice mix, fry for a few seconds then tip in toms and mash them.
1. Bring to boil, add chickpeas, cover and simmer for 8min.
1. Chuck in spinach and coriander and cook for 2 min.
1. Serve with naan and yogurt.
